items.title: Sidechain
items.description: Musical collaboration web3 project that I'm building as part of a hackathon. It allows musicians to collaborate asynchrounously by posting intellectual property while specifying collaboration terms. For example, I can post the vocals to one of my songs, allowing others to remix it and my specified ownership in the remixes will be maintained on chain. Payments made to the contract are split according to ownership.

items.title: Stripe & Printful Merchandise Store
items.description: Web store with Stripe payment processing. Items on the website are pulled directly from Printful, a droppshipper with customizable merchandise (apparel, greeting cards, etc.)

items.title: Friendify
items.description: Spotify app for sharing music taste. Pulls in top Spotify items for a user. Users can generate shareable links for others to join and compare top items. Mobile-friendly and able to play spotify previews in-app. You'll need to get approved with Spotify to use it so just email me if you'd like to test it out.

items.title: Gemini Trading Bot
items.description: Built an automated trading system for the gemini crypto exchange. Supports defining a strategy with Python which specifies when to place limit orders on the exchange, then running it until it reaches its end condition. I want to return to it in the future and build a testing system to develop more strategies.
